name: Let's Spend The Night Together
description:
The weekend is a moment when most people in their daily lives work from Monday to Friday looking for refreshing. But not for some people with lower middle background. They like to spend their weekends hanging out with their friends on the outskirts of the alley drinking cheap wine, while singing until the morning comes.

This illustration is inspired by one of The Rolling Stones' hits single with titled "Let's Spend The Night Together" on their studio album titled Between the Buttons which was released in 1967 by Decca records.

Basic work using Chinese ink on paper and then working through digital media.
Infinite Loop Animation
IMAGE/GIF
